content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5), boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0) and offshore pump (position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5) 
-  Offshore pump (position x=-18.5, y=27.5) 
-  Offshore pump (position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Copper cable factory
No factory has been created yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe.
- Make sure that the pipe is not trying to connect two entities that are not compatible.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when trying to connect offshore pump to boiler
- Check if the offshore pump and boiler are at valid positions for connection.
- Ensure that the offshore pump is working and has a fluid box with water.

### Errors when trying to connect boiler to steam engine
- Check if the boiler and steam engine are at valid positions for connection.
- Ensure that the boiler has a steam output point and the steam engine has an input point.
